EmailTemplate.description: Notification Email sent to Member when Membership Approved/Active
EmailTemplate.name: Sponsor Agreement Approved by ECCHO for MEMBER
EmailTemplate.subject: Sponsored Membership Agreement Approved by ECCHO
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
To {!Sponsoring_Relationships__c.Executed_By_Name__c},
The Clearing House Payments Company L,L,C, has reviewed and approved {!Sponsoring_Relationships__c.Legal_Organization_Name__c}â€™s Sponsored Member agreement with ECCHO.
Your Membership is active effective {!Sponsoring_Relationships__c.Membership_Start_Date_Formatted__c}.
Please reach out to your Sponsoring Organization with any questions.
Sincerely, ECCHO Member Services 214-273-3218 ecchoinfo@theclearinghouse.org
